channel.title: Members on Plazi
channel.description: Recent content in Members on Plazi

item.title: Plazi Members
item.description:
• Donat Agosti
    Taxonomic literature, systematics and conservation
    President Plazi
    Director Plazi GmbH
    Research Associate
    Naturhistorisches Museum, Bern
    Berne, Switzerland
    agosti@plazi.org
  • Klemens Böhm
    Member of Board (2008-)
    Professor
    Lehrstuhl für Systeme der Informationsverwaltung
    Karlsruher Institute of Technology
    Karlsruhe, GERMANY
    boehm@kit.edu
  • Terry Catapano
    Lead developer of TaxonX XML schema and Taxpub Extension of the NLM/NCBI JATS DTD
    Vice-President Plazi
    Columbia University
    New York, USA
    catapano@plazi.org
  • Hong Cui
    Natural language processing, character modeling
    Associate Professor, Information Technologies
    College of Social and Behavioral Sciences
    The University of Arizona
    Tucson, USA
    hongcui@email.arizona.edu
  • Willi Egloff
    Legal Issues
    Director Plazi GmbH
    Lawyer and Partner
    Advocomplex, Bern, Switzerland
    egloff_bader@bluewin.ch

    Member of Board (2008-)

    Entomology
    California Academy of Sciences
    San Francisco, CA, USA

    Associate Professor
    Ecology and Evolutionary Biology
    University of Colorado
    Boulder, Colorado, USA

    Director, Biowikifarm
    Head of Digital World
